item.title: Maple Highways in Talks to Raise $200 Million from SocGen
item.description: Maple Highways Pte Ltd, an Indian road contractor backed by Canada’s second largest pension fund, is in advanced talks to raise about $200 million through a bilateral offshore loan, according to peopl
